snippet: Greg McElroy, the Jets’ third-string quarterback, has used his time on the practice field and in the film room to prepare for the kind of opportunity that befell him Sunday against the Cardinals.
abstract: Profile of New York Jets quarterback Greg McElroy, who has quickly earned the love of fans by replacing embattled starting quarterback Mark Sanchez in game against Arizona Cardinals and leading team to a 7-6 victory in his NFL debut.
lead_paragraph: Greg McElroy, the Jets’ third-string quarterback, has used his time on the practice field and in the film room to prepare for the kind of opportunity that befell him Sunday against the Cardinals.

headline.seo: Greg McElroy, Jets Quarterback, Makes Most of His Chance
headline.main: McElroy Makes the Most of His Moment
headline.print_headline: McElroy Makes the Most of His Moment
